+
+struct vec2 { y: f32 }
+struct vec3 { y: f32, z: f32 }
+
+fn make(v: vec2) {
+    let vec3 { y: _, z: _ } = v;
+    //~^ ERROR mismatched types: expected `vec2` but found `vec3`
+    //~^^ ERROR struct `vec2` does not have a field named `z`
+}
+
+fn main() { }
\ No newline at end of file
